attributes.action: Support a 2nd and final Scottish referendum. With consequences for failure.
attributes.additional_details: We, the majority call on the Government to accept the call for a second referendum.  With the following terms:  This result to be binding for a minimum of 100 years. If The Scottish first Minister fails in her bid to take Scotland out of the UK, but into the EU, then she must immediately resign as a Minister for Scotland.  She must surrender her UK passport immediately.  She must then seek refuge in a comfortable home in a Country of her choice, within the EU.  Which is what she wanted for us.
attributes.background:
The rest of us in the UK are growing tired of the anti-English and probably anti-Welsh sentiment coming from the SNP.  
The comments and nature border on being racist.  The English, Welsh and Northern Irish are sick to the back teeth of listening to the SNP whinging.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament don't have the power to take all of these actions.
